title: Still no reply for my problem with getting scammed.
body:
I put a post  over 12 hours a go and a support ticket around the same time, and still nothing, i only received one email from riot saying that they were looking in to it but its been a full day since they sent that. am i going to get a reply or what? 

PS. this was about my $25 pre paid card and the glitch where my client froze and i didnt receive my RP.

replies.body: Support are always busy, but they'll usually respond within a few days. 12 hours is not enough time for them to get through their queues to you. Please be aware that responding to the ticket or creating a new one before someone gets back to you will bump you back to the bottom of the queue.
Ohh okay. thank you. do they usually compensate if something like this happens?
Usually yes they will, assuming they can nail down where the error happened they'll usually re compensate you for the RP.
Okay thank you very much for your replies, very helpful :D
